wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Crawfurd (1785–1843) was a Scottish poet.

response: He was born on 9 August 1822 in Ayr the second son of the auctioneer and poet Archibald Crawfurd (sic) and his wife Catherine Craig.ODNB: William Crawford
* Notes to Archibald Crawfurd's The Huntly Casket and other Tales and Lyrics; with Reminiscences of the Author, 1861.
